title: What are some senior seminar photography projects? - Quora

response.answer_text: Offer a free studio portrait to senior citizens. For the portrait, ask them to bring a print photo with them—one with great significance to their lives. Make sure that the plane of focus includes this image. Compose an essay about the photo to be included with the work. I have not done such a project but you might enjoy this iPhone photo I snapped of my 77 year old mother. She is standing on her favorite hiking trail. Born in 1942, East Prussia, she and her family survived fleeing from Russian forces advancing on the region during the winter of 1945. The small dog belongs to her grand daughter.
